duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the entire legal process, from investigation and discovery through trial prep and court proceedings, representing clients in depositions, site inspections, court hearings, trials, etc., and negotiating settlements as required.
Research all applicable laws and findings, develop appropriate legal strategies for all stages of litigation, and share them with claims representatives and insured clients.
Establish and maintain good relationships with claims representatives and insured clients and occasionally conduct training sessions for Legal, Claims, or other departments.
Develop and render clear, unambiguous legal opinions and strategies, and draft legal documents including pleadings and motions.

education_certification.credential: JD degree, Membership in the Florida Bar, Special licenses to practice before boards or federal courts preferred
